meanings.definition: A large passenger aircraft powered by jet engines.
meanings.sent1: The jetliner soared through the sky with ease.
meanings.sent2: I always feel excited when boarding a jetliner for a vacation.
meanings.sent3: The jetliner told the propeller plane, 'I'm just too fast for you!'
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took off like a jetliner, reaching new heights every day.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the jetliner's engines was deafening as it took off.

meanings.definition: A commercial airplane designed for long-distance travel.
meanings.sent1: The jetliner carried passengers across oceans and continents.
meanings.sent2: Flying on a jetliner makes long journeys much more comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The jetliner joked to the biplane, 'I can fly circles around you!'
meanings.sent4: His career took off like a jetliner, reaching global success.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the jetliner made it stand out on the runway.
